snippet: A lawsuit has charged New Jersey of withholding data to determine whether low-income families have received a fair share in federal aid.
abstract: Editorial welcomes suit filed by Fair Share Housing Center against New Jersey Gov Chris Christie's administration for withholding data that would allow advocacy group to determine whether low-income and minority residents are getting fair share of $1.8 billion in federal aid for Hurricane Sandy recovery; urges Christie's administration to immediately release pertinent data if it has nothing to hide.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit has charged New Jersey of withholding data to determine whether low-income families have received a fair share in federal aid.
